title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.16 - Incomplete record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 2.16 - Incomplete record

State Regulations

Where a hearing record is incomplete or otherwise fails to
provide the basis for an informed decision, the Superintendent, the

Superintendent's designee, or the hearing officer may direct that the hearing
be reopened. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
2.16

Adopted

New

York State Register March 25, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 12, eff. 3/25/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
